{"id":449273893,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1611905567,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/449273893/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        if(s.size()==0 || s.size()==1) return s;\n        int p1=0; \n        int p2=s.size()-1;\n        vector<int> hash(256, 0);\n        hash['A']=1;\n        hash['a']=1;\n        hash['E']=1;\n        hash['e']=1;\n        hash['i']=1;\n        hash['I']=1;\n        hash['O']=1;\n        hash['o']=1;\n        hash['u']=1;\n        hash['U']=1;\n        while(p1<p2)\n        {\n            if(hash[s[p1]]>0 && hash[s[p2]]>0){\n                swap(s[p1], s[p2]);\n                p1++; p2--;\n            }\n            if(hash[s[p1]]==0)\n                p1++;\n            if(hash[s[p2]]==0)\n                p2--;\n            \n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
